name: Unstable government
description:
This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49

You are just a farmer who try to survive and make some money. 

The government has changed in your country. And who knows what to expect from the new one? New tax reform? New farm reform? or even a new constitution?

Try to survive 5 next unstable years. 

If you run out of money, you will lose!


CONTROLS:

  • LMB to select
  • RMB to deselect
  • F to Fullscreen
  • M to Mute
